```{r global,include=TRUE,echo = FALSE,eval = TRUE}

library(tidyverse)

df = tibble(x = rnorm(100),
            y = rnorm(100))

theme_set(
  theme_bw()+
    theme(legend.position = "top")
)

               min = 1e-4,max = .1,step = .01)
  numericInput("fc","Abs logFC limit",5,
               min = 1,max = 15,step = .5)
  numericInput("lpval","-log(p.value) limit",5,
               min = 1,max = 20)  
  numericInput("bm","Max base mean",50,
               min = 25,step = 100)
```
